name: vscode-lage
description: A vscode extension that understands lage configs and provide utilities such as vscode tasks.

lage.configFilePath.description: Specifies the path to lage config file, default is ${workspaceFolder}/lage.config.js

lage.useWorkspaceLageBinary.description: When set to `true` it uses lage binary from the workspace's `node_modules` using configured `npmClient`, Also requires `'lage': 'lage'` in script in the root `package.json` file

lage.additionalLageArgs.description: Additional arguments passed to `lage` when running targets e.g. `['--verbose', '--reporter adoLog']`

scripts.compile: yarn run check-types && yarn run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: yarn run check-types && yarn run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: yarn run compile-tests && yarn run compile && yarn run lint
